yamlVersion.description: Set default YAML spec version (1.2 or 1.1)

yaml.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between the client and the YAML language service.

yaml.schemas.description: Associate schemas to YAML files in the current workspace

yaml.format.singleQuote.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes

yaml.format.bracketSpacing.description: Print spaces between brackets in objects

yaml.format.proseWrap.description: Always: wrap prose if it exeeds the print width, Never: never wrap the prose, Preserve: wrap prose as-is

yaml.format.printWidth.description: Specify the line length that the printer will wrap on

yaml.customTags.description: Custom tags for the parser to use

yaml.schemaStore.enable.description: Automatically pull available YAML schemas from JSON Schema Store

yaml.schemaStore.url.description: URL of a schema store catalog to use when downloading schemas.

yaml.maxItemsComputed.description: The maximum number of outline symbols and folding regions computed (limited for performance reasons).

editor.tabSize.description: The number of spaces to use when autocompleting

http.proxy.description: The URL of the proxy server that will be used when attempting to download a schema. If it is not set or it is undefined no proxy server will be used.

http.proxyStrictSSL.description: If true the proxy server certificate should be verified against the list of supplied CAs.

yaml.disableDefaultProperties.description: Disable adding not required properties with default values into completion text
